title: CLEAR SCALP & HAIR BEAUTY Moisturizing Dry Scalp Nourishing Conditioner, 12.7 Fluid Ounce
Remington D3020 Volume and Shine Hair Dryer
description: Get more from your ionic, ceramic hair dryer with the Remington Extreme Volume and Shine Hair Dryer. The ionic generator creates 90% more conditioning ions, leaving you frizz-free. Take your hair to new heights with the 1875-watt motor while ceramic technology provides optimal shine. Diffuser and concentrator attachments along with 3 heat and 2 speed settings, give you the flexibility to create multiple styles while the cool shot feature holds your look in place.

CLEAR Men Scalp and Hair 2 in 1 Shampoo and Conditioner, Ocean Mineral Hydration, 12.9 Ounce
description: If you just wash dandruff flakes away they will always come back. Because clear understands male scalp needs are different, clear men scalp and hair is specially designed to control dandruff symptoms at the source and lock in hydration from the first wash. Clinically proven to hydrate the scalp. Helps restore the natural moisture balance of the scalp. With hydra blend, a mix of water mint, spirulina and other extracts.
